MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA11 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Wysall Close and surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2PM for urgent repairs to our network. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.36PM on 8th February 2021
